quoteText: To learn more, visit the Facebook Security Help Center and Instagram Security Tips.
title: info given about risk of publishing your info online

tosdr.case: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online
tosdr.tldr: Facebook provides “security tips” to help you be more secure online.
